sqlMap.select: -- $option$ select #intYear#,#intMonth#,nmUsers,getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and vcLocalIP is null

$option$ select intBscId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatApnNetSpaceHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intBscId,intRaitype

$option$ select intSgsnId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatApnNetSpaceHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intSgsnId,intRaitype

$option$ select intStreetId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatNewBussTerminalHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intStreetId,intRaitype

$option$ select intSaleAreaId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatApnAdminSpaceHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intSaleAreaId,intRaitype

$option$ select nmAreaId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatGroupAreaHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by nmAreaId,intRaitype

$option$ select nmAreaId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatGroupAreaBussHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by nmAreaId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId,intRaitype

$option$ select resident.nmAreaId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(resident.nmImsi)),getdate(),resident.intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ( select nmAreaId,count(nmImsi) as imsiCount,nmImsi,intRaitype from ftbStatGroupAreaHourUsers_week ,ftbResidentConfig where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbResidentConfig.intType=2 group by nmAreaId,intRaitype ,nmImsi,ftbResidentConfig.intDay having imsiCount>=ftbResidentConfig.intDay ) as resident where 1 = 1 group by resident.nmAreaId,resident.intRaitype

$option$ select nmTerminalId,#intYear#,#intMonth#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype,#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatNetTerminalTypeHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by nmTerminalId,intRaitype
